paper_abstract: Generalizations of various random tessellation models generated by Poisson point processes are introduced, and their functional probability P(K) is given. They are obtained from Boolean random function models, and alternatively from a geodesic distance, providing a generic way of simulation of a wide range of random tessellations, as illustrated in the paper. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Random tessellations generated by Boolean random functions
